availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Lawrenceburg, Anderson County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer, son of Wafer and Eliza Satterwhite.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 17.

Find A Grave, Entry for J W Satterwhite (1836-1879), Find A Grave Memorial # 29927104, Satterwhite Cemetery, Alton, Anderson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=29927104&ref=acom (accessed 3 Jul 2017).
